title: Road Trips
details: I like going on road trips with friends, exploring scenic routes, coastal towns, and hidden gems across Ireland.
Summer is perfect for sunny beach visits and relaxed seaside drives.

title: Singing in the University Choir
details: I enjoy being part of a musical group that performs harmonized choral pieces at events and concerts.
I attended weekly rehearsals with the choir society and joined performances during major events like Christmas services.

title: Swimming
details: I love swimming, but the temperature in Ireland can be quite cold.
